title: Web Development Practical Competency Enhancement: VR-Based Spatial Design Education: Project-Based Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners analyze three-dimensional spatial components in a VR environment and apply mathematical ratios/calculations to create spatial design proposals
Learners enhance spatial cognition and problem-solving skills by solving real-world scenarios (e.g., office layout design) using a PBL approach
Learners revise design proposals incorporating peer feedback based on VR simulation results and derive improvements through formative assessments
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
